title: [Gameplay] Sion Emote Bug
body:
When I tried to do any of the emotes for Sion, I would get the animation and sound, but no voice, and I have tried this repeatedly. 

Pls fix it!!!!

replies.body:
Hiya, 

If you're spamming emotes, or if one line of VO doesn't finish before you attempt to trigger another, only the animation will play. 

For example, if you trigger /joke, but don't wait for the VO to finish before triggering /taunt, only the taunt animation will play, and you won't hear any VO. 

If this isn't the case, and you're not hearing any VO for any emote, please let me know, and we can look into this further! :]
I found that I can't laugh in battle. I do the animation, sure, but if I get into battle, I laugh muted.

Hey, 

I tried waiting after any VO was played and It still didn't play anything, I asked one of my friends to hover over my character when I did an emote and he said he heard nothing. So I believe that the VO for emotes might be glitched and I hope you can fix this if it is.

Thanks

P.S. Unrelated to Sion, I really think you should add a passive indicator to Xin Zhao's W so you know when you can heal (Sorry if this is a bit much and thanks for replying).
